synopsis.text: That’s right, the lovable underdogs of Class F are back for another round of hilarious antics and high-stakes Avatar battles in the second season of Baka and Test – Summon the Beasts! This time around, the girls of Class F have shifted their focus from academic advancement to matters of the heart, each vying for the attention of their clueless male counterparts. Amidst this romantic turmoil, Akihisa Yoshii and Yuuji Sakamoto find themselves in a sticky situation, blackmailed by a mysterious stalker who threatens to expose their deepest, darkest secrets. As the summer season kicks off, the students of Class F face a series of misadventures both in and out of school, from beach escapades to cross-dressing beauty pageants and academic training camps. Despite their less-than-stellar academic performance, the students of Class F never back down from a challenge, proving that when it comes to love and friendship, they're anything but failures.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
